models.name: GPT-4
models.quality: SOTA, highest accuracy for complex tasks

models.name: Claude 2
models.quality: Competitive with GPT-3.5, capable on code review

models.name: Claude Instant
models.quality: Very fast, less accurate for complex review, best for routine checks

models.name: CodeBERT (fine-tuned)
models.quality: Very high, within 1-2 points of GPT-4 for routine bug/style review

models.name: CodeT5+ (fine-tuned)
models.quality: High, nearly matches GPT-4 for focused code review tasks

code_review.summary: Gemini Pro offers competitive accuracy to Claude 2 for code reviews at a significantly lower price per run. Fine-tuned models remain most efficient for routine code checks.
